properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v5 v9 v10 v11 v12 v13 v14 v15 v5 v16 v17 v18 v19 v5

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In all thy works i see Thy glory

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In mighty wonders; in small and simple things

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My heart rejoices in the bounty set before me

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Each rising sun tells of Thy goodness

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: The rain proclaims Thee in the life it brings

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: All creation bears Thee sure and silent witness

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: The stars that crown the realms of space

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Reflect the image of Thy grace

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: The rolling seas, the earth and sky

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Declare Thy pow’r, Thy majesty and might

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: I see Thy hand in man’s compassion

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Thou art the font of kindness whence it springs

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Thy boundless charity hath wrought my soul’s salvation

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: For changeless love and endless mercy

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: For countless blessings beyond the wealth of kings

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: For every perfect gift Thou sendest ,
